titleStmt.title: The humble petition of the officers now engaged for Ireland: to the supreme authority of England, the Commons assembled in Parliament. With the orders of Parliament in answer thereunto. / Ordered by the Commons assembled in Parliament, that this petition and orders thereupon be forthwith printed and published: Hen: Scobell, Cleric. Parliamenti.
titleStmt.author: Cook, George, Colonel.
England and Wales. Parliament. House of Commons.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Edward Husband, printer to the Parliament of England,

notesStmt.note: Signed on A3v: Geo: Cook [and 12 others].
The Commons' reply is dated 7 July 1649.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
